display.panel: 5.5-inch (diagonal) widescreen LCD Multi‑Touch display with IPS technology

video_recording.1080p: 1080p HD video recording at 30 fps or 60 fps
video_recording.slo_mo: Slo-mo video support for 1080p at 120 fps and 720p at 240 fps

secure_authentication.detail: Second-generation fingerprint sensor built into the Home button

apple_pay.description: Pay with your iPhone using Touch ID in stores, within apps, and on the web
apple_pay.rewards: Receive and redeem rewards using rewards cards

video_calling.detail: Initiate video calls over Wi‑Fi or cellular to any FaceTime-enabled device

audio_calling.detail: Initiate audio calls over Wi‑Fi or cellular to any FaceTime audio-enabled device

audio_playback.formats: AAC (8 to 320 Kbps), Protected AAC (from iTunes Store), HE-AAC, MP3 (8 to 320 Kbps), MP3 VBR, Dolby Digital (AC-3), Dolby Digital Plus (E-AC-3), Audible (formats 2, 3, 4, Audible Enhanced Audio, AAX, and AAX+), Apple Lossless, AIFF, and WAV

video_playback.formats: Video formats supported: H.264, MPEG-4, and Motion JPEG
video_playback.airplay: AirPlay Mirroring, photos, and video out to Apple TV (2nd generation or later)
video_playback.mirroring: Video mirroring and video out support: Up to 1080p through Lightning Digital AV Adapter and Lightning to VGA Adapter (adapters sold separately)

siri.description: Use your voice to send messages, set reminders, and more
siri.detail1: Get intelligent suggestions in Messages, Mail, QuickType, and more
siri.detail2: Activate with only your voice using “Hey Siri”

power_and_battery.charging2: Charging via USB to computer system or power adapter

sim_card.detail: Not compatible with existing micro-SIM cards
